meanings.definition: The quality or state of being redolent.
meanings.sent1: The redolencies of the flowers filled the room with a sweet fragrance.
meanings.sent2: I love the redolencies of freshly baked bread in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The redolencies of the perfume were so strong that it made everyone sneeze.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking had the redolencies of a gourmet chef's creations.
meanings.sent5: The redolencies of the forest after the rain were enchanting.

meanings.sent1: The redolencies of the bakery made my mouth water.
meanings.sent2: The redolencies of the ocean breeze were invigorating.
meanings.sent3: The redolencies of the freshly cut grass reminded me of summer.
meanings.sent4: The redolencies of the coffee shop drew me in from down the street.
meanings.sent5: The redolencies of the flowers in the garden were delightful.
